scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && DOCKER_HOST='ssh://docker' NODE_ENV=production docker compose -f docker/compose.yaml -f docker/compose-prod.yaml up -d --build
scripts.dev: pnpm run build && NODE_ENV=dev docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose-dev.yaml -f compose-dev-local.yaml up -d --build
scripts.dev-remote: pnpm run build && DOCKER_HOST='ssh://newco-testing' NODE_ENV=dev docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose-dev.yaml -f compose-dev-remote.yaml up -d --build --force-recreate
